tag_list: vp, product, vp-product, vice-president, internet, startups, strategy
overview: Willhoite is a seasoned product management executive with over a decade of experience in product strategy and development. Her expertise ranges from building company and product strategies for publicly traded companies to being well-known for getting her hands dirty launching critical product cycles. A veteran of the online community space, she was seasoned at Yahoo! and has spent her career immersed in online communities and consumer-driven online businesses.
